title: League of Legends champion art

embed.description: DeviantArt is the world's largest online social community for artists and art enthusiasts, allowing people to connect through the creation and sharing of art.

body:
I am creating a collection of my re-edits of League of Legends champions. I am attempting to create a style for each champion which matches what I think is a major characteristic of the champion. I will be adding to it on a week day basis. 

- Greywhite aka Redblacksquare

replies.body: I don't get the teemo one, what am I suppose to be seeing?

The Teemo image started as an idea that a small Teemo casts a long shadow. A more representative piece was create but I was not entirely happy with it. Playing around with some other features Studio Artist, my art program I got this image. While very abstract the arrangement of coloured shapes just appealed to me and still had some connection to the idea.

Thanks for viewing the images and taking the time to comment.
